kou commented on issue #2068: ARROW-2613: [Docs] Update the gen_apidocs docker script
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2068#issuecomment-390437009
 
 
   It's caused by GLib version mismatch.
   
   The system GLib is 2.56.1 and the GLib installed by Miniconda is 2.55.0.
   In the current configuration, we find the system GLib by `pkg-config` but we use `libglib.so` of the Miniconda GLib.
   
   The following patch fixes this situation:
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/dev/gen_apidocs/create_documents.sh b/dev/gen_apidocs/create_documents.sh
   index c6b19fd0..8571624a 100755
   --- a/dev/gen_apidocs/create_documents.sh
   +++ b/dev/gen_apidocs/create_documents.sh
   @@ -26,7 +26,6 @@ export ARROW_BUILD_TYPE=release
    export ARROW_HOME=$(pwd)/apidocs-dist
    export PARQUET_HOME=$(pwd)/apidocs-dist
    CONDA_BASE=/home/ubuntu/miniconda
   -export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=$(pwd)/apidocs-dist/lib/pkgconfig:${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}
    export PATH=${CONDA_BASE}/bin:${PATH}
    # For newer GCC per https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/development.html#known-issues
    export CXXFLAGS="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"
   @@ -52,6 +51,8 @@ source activate pyarrow-dev
    export ARROW_BUILD_TOOLCHAIN=$CONDA_PREFIX
    export PARQUET_BUILD_TOOLCHAIN=$CONDA_PREFIX
    export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$(pwd)/apidocs-dist/lib:${CONDA_PREFIX}/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}
   +export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${CONDA_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}
   +export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=$(pwd)/apidocs-dist/lib/pkgconfig:${PKG_CONFIG_PATH}
    
    CPP_BUILD_DIR=$(pwd)/arrow/cpp/build_apidocs
    
   ```

kou commented on issue #2068: ARROW-2613: [Docs] Update the gen_apidocs docker script
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2068#issuecomment-390437858
 
 
   Ah, sorry. `libglib2.0-dev` is already installed as a dependency of `libgirepository1.0-dev`.
   We can replace `libgtk2.0-dev` with `libtool`.
   
   And `autogen` isn't needed. It's not related with `c_glib/autogen.sh`.
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/dev/gen_apidocs/Dockerfile b/dev/gen_apidocs/Dockerfile
   index bac8dc21..13a6ff4a 100644
   --- a/dev/gen_apidocs/Dockerfile
   +++ b/dev/gen_apidocs/Dockerfile
   @@ -35,8 +35,7 @@ RUN apt-get update && \
            gobject-introspection \
            libgirepository1.0-dev \
            gtk-doc-tools \
   -        autogen \
   -        libgtk2.0-dev \
   +        libtool \
            autoconf-archive \
            npm
    
   ```
